body_html:
I don't understand what is problem, but my resolution is this.

Don't use .to(device). Use .cuda().

Also, type of indices and values must be cuda() to naturally infer the type of sparse tensor.

body:
I don't understand what is problem, but my resolution is this.

Don't use .to(device). Use .cuda().

Also, type of indices and values must be cuda() to naturally infer the type of sparse tensor.
